attributes.action: Stop the roll out of 5G in the UK until research is some into the side effects.
attributes.additional_details:
It is also a a violation and invasion of privacy. The government use us a guinea pigs, testing the side affects of the exposure to this ridiculous existential threat - non thermal microwave radiation which just so happens to be a carcinogen. 

There are 400,000 of these transmitters already in the UK attached to lampposts. This should be considered a humanitarian crime considering it is 868 mega herz which is deadly.
attributes.background: The government will cause the biggest cataclysm ever inflicted on us all. The radiation emitted from this will cook insides and cause clusters of cancer. No long term reasearch has been put into this project at all and works outside of any of the current regulatory standards.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the Government or Parliament to commission and fund an independent inquiry into the safety of mobile internet signals.
